Requirements You are in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.ymyhuyGwv8vEnLIH]{Iai Stance}

With a deep breath, you focus on the battlefield and your foe. Make a @Check[perception] check against a Level-based DC of a level equal to a creature you can see.

Critical Success As success, but the circumstance bonus increases to +2.

Success You spot a fatal flaw in your target's defenses. Until the end of your next turn, the first strike while in Iai Stance gains a +1 circumstance bonus to its attack roll.

Failure You fail to spot any openings on your oponents defenses.

Critical Failure You cannot find any openings on your opponent's form. The creature becomes immune to Total Concentration for 10 minutes.
